name: Youtube Search with SerpAPI
description: Performs a YouTube search using SerpAPI and returns the results in JSON or HTML format.
author: @@localhost.sep-shinkai

BasicConfig.description: Required SerpAPI api_key. You can create a free account at https://serpapi.com

search_query.description: The search query string to search on YouTube.

error.description: Error message if the search failed.

results.description: The JSON response results from SerpAPI.

status.description: Status of the search operation, either 'success' or 'error'.
